Theme Development Bootstrap Based Theme for Applications

Extended Background Colors

Add a -light/-dark postfix to default bootstrap colors.

.bg-primary-dark

.bg-primary

.bg-primary-light

.bg-secondary-dark

.bg-secondary

.bg-secondary-light

.bg-success-dark

.bg-success

.bg-success-light

.bg-info-dark

.bg-info

.bg-info-light

.bg-warning-dark

.bg-warning

.bg-warning-light

.bg-danger-dark

.bg-danger

.bg-danger-light

.bg-light-dark

.bg-light

.bg-light-light

.bg-dark-dark

.bg-dark

.bg-dark-light

Extended Background Colors with Matching Text

Change bg- to the bt- prefix to get smart text color presets.

.bt-primary-dark

.bt-primary

.bt-primary-light

.bt-secondary-dark

.bt-secondary

.bt-secondary-light

.bt-success-dark

.bt-success

.bt-success-light

.bt-info-dark

.bt-info

.bt-info-light

.bt-warning-dark

.bt-warning

.bt-warning-light

.bt-danger-dark

.bt-danger

.bt-danger-light

.bt-light-dark

.bt-light

.bt-light-light

.bt-dark-dark

.bt-dark

.bt-dark-light
